participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Melancholic and introspective, struggling with self-acceptance but still capable of love.
participant_1.background: i am overweight and unhappy. i work at a nursing home. i do not believe in god. i spend most of my time on facebook when i am not working. my wife left me and took my children.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and nurturing, devoted to her family and passionate about her career.
participant_2.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. i enjoy going to the park. i am a doctor. i am now looking for a new job. my favorite movie is friday.

content.text: I am good. how are they? I work on facebook. how about you?
do you have any hobbies? I am on facebook. I work in nursing
do you like movies? I do. I like facebook. I am unhappy
I like to spend time with my wife and children. do you?
My daughter has a brilliant mind and I enjoy time with her very much.
